predictions.text: U.S. CPI-U headline m/m (seasonally adjusted) for August 2025 will be between 0.0% and 0.2%, as reported by BLS on 2025-09-11.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify in the BLS CPI news release dated 2025-09-11 that the 'All items' seasonally adjusted percent change from the previous month is >= 0.0% and <= 0.2%.
monitoring_signals: Cleveland Fed Inflation Nowcast for August 2025
AAA/EIA weekly gasoline price trends
Manheim used vehicle value index
BLS CPI methodological notes and seasonal adjustment factors
Brent/WTI price changes into CPI reference period
predictions.rationale: Labor softness and cooling demand point to subdued headline inflation; energy risk is the swing factor.

predictions.text: The U.S. 5-Year Treasury yield (FRED: DGS5) will close at or below 3.95% on at least one trading day by 2025-09-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirm via FRED series DGS5 that any daily close on or before 2025-09-30 is <= 3.95%.
monitoring_signals: CME FedWatch probabilities for September FOMC
Core CPI/PPI prints for August
Fed communication (speeches, blackout timing)
MOVE index and Treasury futures positioning
Term premium estimates and auction demand (5Y/7Y)
predictions.rationale: Soft data and higher cut odds should pressure intermediate yields despite elevated term premia.

predictions.text: By 2025-09-09, OPEC+ will announce no net increase to aggregate production targets for October 2025 versus September 2025 in its official post-meeting communiqué.
predictions.verification_criteria: Check OPEC/OPEC+ press release or ministerial statement by 2025-09-09; targets must be described as unchanged overall for October vs September. Minor member reallocations that do not raise the combined target count as no net increase.
monitoring_signals: JMMC/JMMC press briefings and leaks
Saudi and Russian energy ministry statements
Front-month Brent/WTI time spreads
Tanker tracking and export guidance
IEA/OPEC demand revisions
predictions.rationale: Fragile demand and compliance risks argue for maintaining current targets to support prices.

predictions.text: From 2025-09-06 close to 2025-09-27 close, AppLovin (APP) will outperform SPDR S&P 500 ETF (SPY) by at least 4.0 percentage points based on percentage change in adjusted close prices.
predictions.verification_criteria: Using a single data source (e.g., Yahoo Finance), compute adjusted close percentage change for APP and SPY from 2025-09-06 close to 2025-09-27 close. APP minus SPY must be >= +4.0 percentage points.
monitoring_signals: S&P index rebalancing effective date and passive inflows
APP trading volume and short interest/borrow rates
Options skew/open interest around inclusion
Sector momentum in software/adtech peers
SPY ETF flows and macro risk sentiment
predictions.rationale: Index inclusion typically drives pre-effective-date inflows and momentum in newly added names.

predictions.text: By 2025-10-15, the U.S. Treasury’s OFAC will announce at least one new sanctions designation targeting Brazilian individuals or entities via a public press release or sanctions list update.
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirm on treasury.gov (press releases or SDN list updates) that at least one Brazilian person or entity is newly designated on or before 2025-10-15.
monitoring_signals: Developments in Bolsonaro-related legal proceedings
Statements from U.S. State Department and White House
Congressional letters or hearings referencing Brazil
Brazil–U.S. diplomatic engagements and media leaks
OFAC update cadence and regional focus shifts
predictions.rationale: Escalating political-legal tensions increase the likelihood of targeted U.S. sanctions actions.

predictions.text: NYMEX WTI front-month futures will settle at or above $92.50 per barrel at least once by 2025-10-15.
predictions.verification_criteria: Use CME/NYMEX official settlement prices for the nearest-month WTI Light Sweet Crude (ticker CL). Any settlement on or before 2025-10-15 of >= $92.50 satisfies the condition.
monitoring_signals: OPEC+ output decisions and compliance
EIA weekly crude balances and SPR activity
Brent–WTI spreads and time-spread backwardation
China demand indicators and refinery runs
USD index (DXY) movements
predictions.rationale: Tight supply management and geopolitics can lift prompt crude despite demand fragility.

predictions.text: By 2025-10-31, Google (Alphabet Inc.) will file an appeal against the European Commission’s €2.95B ad tech fine with the General Court of the European Union.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify via EU General Court docket, EU Official Journal notices, Alphabet statements, or major press that an action for annulment/appeal was filed by 2025-10-31.
monitoring_signals: DG COMP and EU court registry updates
Alphabet investor relations and blog posts
Law firm alerts on EU competition litigation
Reporting from FT, Reuters, Bloomberg on filings
predictions.rationale: Alphabet routinely contests major EU competition fines; an appeal is standard procedure.
